title: Validate Glassmorphism Generator with typical input
description: Verify that the Glassmorphism Generator correctly creates frosted glass effects with user-provided blur, opacity, and border settings, including live preview and CSS export.

steps.description: Navigate to the Glassmorphism Generator tool page
Input valid blur, opacity, and border values
Check that the live preview updates to reflect the settings
Export the generated CSS
Verify the exported CSS matches the input parameters

title: Glassmorphism Generator handles edge blur values
description: Test the Glassmorphism Generator with minimum and maximum blur values to verify stability and correct visual output.

steps.description: Set blur value to minimum allowed
Check live preview does not break and correctly reflects minimal blur
Set blur value to maximum allowed
Check live preview updates without performance issues and displays strong blur

title: Color Palette Generator creates harmonious palettes
description: Verify color palette generation produces harmonious color schemes with multiple palette options and supports export.

steps.description: Navigate to Color Palette Generator tool
Generate palettes using different algorithm options
Ensure the palettes displayed contain harmonious colors
Export the current palette
Verify that export data matches the displayed colors

title: Color Palette Generator handles empty or invalid inputs
description: Test system response when empty or invalid inputs are provided to palette generation and ensure error handling or default behaviors occur.

steps.description: Attempt to generate palette with invalid color codes or empty inputs
Confirm appropriate error messages or fallback palettes are displayed

title: Gradient Text Generator creates customized gradients
description: Verify gradient text generator allows customization of colors and exports correct CSS gradient definitions.

steps.description: Access Gradient Text Generator tool
Customize start and end colors for the gradient text
Check live preview text updates to reflect chosen gradient
Export the CSS for the gradient text
Verify exported CSS defines correct gradient background

title: Box Shadow Generator supports multiple layers
description: Test Box Shadow Generator functionality including adding, editing, and removing multiple shadow layers with individual customization.

steps.description: Open Box Shadow Generator tool
Add multiple shadow layers with varying offsets, blur, spread, and colors
Verify preview updates correctly with all layers applied
Edit shadow properties and remove a shadow layer
Confirm preview updates reflect edits and removal
Export final CSS box-shadow property
Check that exported CSS matches the applied shadow layers

title: Blob Generator produces valid SVG shapes
description: Ensure the Blob Generator creates organic shapes customized by user inputs and allows export of valid SVG files.

steps.description: Navigate to Blob Generator tool
Adjust parameters such as complexity, size, and randomness
Verify shape preview updates accordingly
Export blob as SVG file
Confirm that exported SVG is well-formed and renders correctly

title: CSS Grid Generator creates layouts with valid grid settings
description: Validate that CSS Grid Generator accepts gap, column count, and row count inputs to generate valid CSS grid layouts and previews the result.

steps.description: Open CSS Grid Generator tool
Input various values for gap, columns, and rows
Check the live grid preview updates correctly
Export generated CSS grid code
Verify exported CSS matches input configurations

title: Contrast Checker accurately calculates contrast ratios
description: Confirm the Contrast Checker computes WCAG compliance levels and contrast ratio between foreground and background colors correctly.

steps.description: Access Contrast Checker tool
Input multiple foreground and background color pairs including edge cases
Verify displayed contrast ratio matches expected values
Check compliance status for WCAG AA and AAA criteria is accurate

title: Meta Tags Generator outputs SEO-optimized meta tags
description: Test that Meta Tags Generator creates correct meta tags for SEO and social media and exports valid HTML snippets.

steps.description: Open Meta Tags Generator tool
Input webpage title, description, keywords, social media info
Verify generated meta tags reflect user inputs correctly
Export meta tags as HTML
Confirm exported snippet contains valid, SEO-optimized tags

title: AI Prompt Generator creates structured, customizable prompts
description: Ensure AI Prompt Generator lets users build AI assistant prompts using templates with customizable fields and exports them correctly.

steps.description: Access AI Prompt Generator tool
Select different prompt templates and fill in customizable fields
Verify the constructed prompt text updates as per inputs
Export the prompt text
Check the exported prompt matches the constructed prompt

title: Favorites system persists starred tools
description: Test that users can star favorite tools and that these favorites are persisted correctly and restored upon page reload.

steps.description: Navigate to tools list
Star multiple tools as favorites
Check that favorited tools appear in favorites list
Reload the application or page
Verify favorites list is preserved and shows previously starred tools

title: Presets management allows save, load, and delete operations
description: Verify presets for customized tool configurations can be saved, loaded correctly, and deleted without errors across all tools.

steps.description: Configure a tool with custom parameters
Save the current configuration as a preset
Confirm preset is added to preset list
Load the saved preset
Check that the tool parameters reflect the preset's values
Delete the saved preset
Verify the preset is removed and cannot be loaded

title: Export history logs exports with relevant details
description: Check that each export action from any tool is logged in export history with correct metadata and can be managed by the user.

steps.description: Perform exports from different tools with varying configurations
Check that export history lists each export with tool name, timestamp, and summary
Delete an entry from export history
Verify the deleted export no longer appears in history

title: Theme toggling respects system preferences and manual override
description: Test automatic dark/light mode switching based on system preference and manual user toggling with preference persistence.

steps.description: Set system theme to dark mode
Verify application automatically switches to dark mode
Manually toggle to light mode using theme toggle control
Check application changes to light mode and preference is saved
Reload application
Verify saved theme preference overrides system theme

title: Command Palette opens and navigates correctly
description: Verify Command Palette is triggered by Cmd/Ctrl+K shortcut and navigates correctly between all tools and main pages.

steps.description: Press Cmd/Ctrl+K keyboard shortcut
Ensure Command Palette overlay opens
Search and select different tools and pages from palette
Verify navigation updates to selected tool or page

title: Responsive layout adapts on various device sizes
description: Test that all UI components including tools, menus, and previews render correctly and remain fully functional on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Access application using desktop screen size
Verify full layout with visible navigation and tool panels
Resize viewport to tablet dimensions
Check layout adjusts for tablet with accessible controls
Resize viewport to narrow mobile width
Verify optimized mobile view with responsive menus and usable tool interfaces

title: SEO components generate correct meta tags and sitemap
description: Ensure SEO utilities generate valid meta tags, sitemap XML, and structured data conforming to SEO best practices and standards.

steps.description: Generate meta tags for sample webpage using Meta Tags Generator
Verify generated meta tags contain correct values and attributes
Generate sitemap and structured data
Validate sitemap XML structure and structured data correctness against SEO standards

title: Subscription backend manages user sessions reliably
description: Test Supabase backend integration for user subscription management including login state, session persistence, and subscription status retrieval.

steps.description: Sign in using valid subscriber account
Confirm user session is established and subscription status is retrieved
Sign out user
Verify session is cleared and user is logged out
Attempt to access subscriber-only features when signed out
Check access is denied or redirect to login
